Dr. Hari is very professional, polite, honest and down to earth person. 
We visited Dr Hari for our 8 year old child last year and we as a family had decided to consider Dr. Hari as our family Dentist. 
Would definitely recommend Dr. Hari‚Äôs Dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went Dr.Hari's dental clinic for crown. He has done crown in very short tym and given my smile back. In between he has given 2 trials also and still I have given corrections. But Dr. Hari is so kind and patient.
I'm so thankful to Dr. Hari for bringing my beautiful smile back.

Overall I can say he has magic in his hands.
All the staff and doctors are so kind with smiling face to me. I really love them for patient's service Dr.Sathya Dr. Adhira Dr.Rajalakshmi....thanks to everyone for making me happy.... Thank u so much Dr.Hari

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited the clinic for my mother-in-law‚Äôs dental deep cleaning. The doctors were very friendly. They were very patient in explaining the problems, it‚Äôs causes and remediation. Dr Hari had an initial diagnosis and suggested the right treatment. Dr. Ranjit, the gum specialist, did an awesome job handling such an elderly person through out the cleaning process which lasted more than 2 hours. He was very much knowledgeable and his treatment was up to the mark.  The office was very clean and everyone in the office was down to earth. They charged me a very nominal fee that no one can challenge in the dentistry. I strongly suggest everyone to visit Dr. Hari‚Äôs Dental Care for all your dental-related issues.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I was very nervous about visiting a Dental clinic because of a prior bad experience and hence kept postponing the extraction of my wisdom teeth. Finally when it started giving lot of pain, visited Dr Hariharan and it was a really breezy and painless experience. Dr is very pleasant and humble and handled my nervousness without getting impatient. Special thanks to Dr Sangavi for her help with handling my nervousness and post extraction recommendations and instructions. 
Now my RCT is in progress and had a very painless experience.

review: Mr.Hari is an excellent professional.He does care about me during each visit and answered very clearly on each questions I have.He made me comfortable at very first visit.I guess my trip to India from US become successful after visiting him for my dental work. Some of My tooth was in very bad shape and he does a great job.The doc never hurried in any of my visit and cleared my problems.He fixed my infected tooth taking very care .I believe he is very passionate about what he does.did I write about followup ? review: Had Tooth pain I was not sure about the condition of my right lower molar teeth. I was advised by other dentist about it's extraction I neglected the advice and paid the price of getting the next teeth also to get cavity and infected badly. Worried about the pain and how to manage the wisdom teeth extraction followed by RCT of the adjacent teeth as well. Dr.Hari made me get thru this process with ease. Felt so comfortable and happy about getting treated by this doctor. Highly recommend him you can relax as he understand your pain and need, his ***** *** experience will certainly make you feel so good.
reply_text: Thanks you sir for your feedback

review: Always suggest the costlier treatment method to the patients those who are came just for an appointment.* *********** ***** *** ***** *** charged 500rs for the X-ray *** ******* **** ***** ***** ** ** *** ** **** ******* ******* I came out with lot of dissatisfaction.. reply_text: Dear sir, we are sorry to know that you weren't comfortable with our charges. Your feedback is taken and will be considered during our pricing strategy meetings, in consultation with our doctors. The x-rays which were taken during your visit was purely for diagnostic purpose. Affordable healthcare without compromising on the quality is of utmost priority at Dr Hari's dental center and we will continue to strive for the same. We are always available for a quick discussion regarding the services required and the best possible charges for the same. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for the feedback. Happy smiling!
